data.meta_description: Buy Jamaica Inn (75th Anniversary Edition) (1939) On Blu-Ray today! Rare Mystery film starring  Charles Laughton, Horace Hodges, Hay Petrie, Frederick Piper, Herbert Lomas.
data.text:
Actors: Charles Laughton, Horace Hodges, Hay Petrie, Frederick Piper, Herbert Lomas Director: Alfred Hitchcock Genre: Mystery Year: 1939 Studio: Cohen Media Group Length: 98 minutes Released: May 12, 2015 Rating: Not Rated Format: Blu-Ray (NTSC/Region 1) Misc: Black & White Language: English Subtitles: N/A

DESCRIPTION:

A rediscovered classic by the master of suspense, fully restored in 4K in collaboration with the British Film Institute from an archival picture negative. In this dark period drama, a young woman discovers her uncle heads a gang of ship-wreckers and murderers under the secret patronage of the local squire, wickedly played by Charles Laughton. Her efforts to stop their wicked ways leads her down a path filled with murder and betrayal.
